description.en: $LOVE token was donated to everyone who donated to the UkraineDAO Party Bid and for everyone who donated directly to the ukrainedao.eth prior to the snapshot on Mar 3. The $LOVE token is a symbol, not a utility, commemorating the donor’s contribution. Seeing these tokens or other POAPs in one’s wallet reminds people of the bigger picture behind Web3 building and decentralized organizations.
